content:
path /cdn/v1/stacks/stackid/purge
operationId PurgeContent
parameters
name stackid
description A stack ID or slug
in path
required True
schema
type string
summary Purge content
description Purge cached content for all CDN sites on a stack Content is recached on the CDN the next time it is requested Use the returned purge ID to see the status of a purge request
requestBody
cdnPurgeContentRequest
type object
items
type array
PurgeContentRequestItem
type object
properties
url
type string
description The URL at which to delete content
recursive
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not to recursively delete content from the CDN
invalidateOnly
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not to mark the asset as expired and revalidate instead of deleting
purgeAllDynamic
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not to purge dynamic versions of assets

This is ignored if recursive is true
headers
type string
description A list of HTTP request headers used to construct a cache key to purge content by These headers must be configured in the site configurations DynamicContentheaderFields property
purgeSelector
type array
PurgeContentRequestPurgeSelector
type object
properties
PurgeContentRequestPurgeSelectorType
type string
default HEADER
description The kinds of content that can be purged from the CDN

 HEADER Purge content based on an HTTP response header
  TAG Purge content based on an XTAG HTTP header value Purging by tag can be useful when content on the origin is tagged
selectorName
type string
description The name of the type of content to purge

For example the name of the HTTP response header Names are case sensitive
selectorValue
type string
description The value of the content to purge

For example the value of the HTTP response header Values are case sensitive and may be wildcarded but cannot match a /
selectorValueDelimiter
type string
description The delimiter to separate multiple values with

Defaults to
description A key/value pair definition of content to purge from the CDN
description A key/value pair definition of content to purge from the CDN
description The items to purge from the CDN
required True
responses
200
cdnPurgeContentResponse
type object
id
type string
description The purge requests ID

Use this ID to request completion of the purge request
description The response from a request to purge content from the CDN
